## Air Zones

British Columbia is divided into seven air zones. The air zones were defined based on common characteristics such as air quality, geography, meteorology, pollution sources, and other factors to efficiently help manage air quality.

-   Coastal

-   Central Interior

-   Georgia Strait

-   Lower Fraser Valley

-   Northeast

-   Northwest

-   Southern Interior

Click on the map to find more about each of B.C.'s air zones.
